verses.text: \w Now|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w* \w fought|strong="H3898"\w* \w against|strong="H3898"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w men|strong="H3478"\w* \w of|strong="H2022"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w fled|strong="H5127"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w them|strong="H6440"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* many \w fell|strong="H5307"\w* \w slain|strong="H2491"\w* \w on|strong="H5307"\w* \w Mount|strong="H2022"\w* \w Gilboa|strong="H1533"\w*.

\w They|strong="H7760"\w* \w put|strong="H7760"\w* \w his|strong="H7760"\w* \w armor|strong="H3627"\w* \w in|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H7760"\w* \w temple|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w their|strong="H7760"\w* gods \w and|strong="H1004"\w* hung \w his|strong="H7760"\w* \w head|strong="H1538"\w* \w in|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H7760"\w* \w temple|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Dagon|strong="H1712"\w*.

\w So|strong="H3808"\w* \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w died|strong="H4191"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H8104"\w* \w unfaithfulness|strong="H4604"\w* \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w because|strong="H5921"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w did|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w even|strong="H1571"\w* \w consulted|strong="H7592"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w medium|strong="H7592"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w guidance|strong="H1875"\w*,
